blogPost.title: What is the women peace and security (WPS) agenda? @_Nisha_Singh, Global Policy and Advocacy Manager at @womenforwomenUK and @WomenforWomen, explains. https://t.co/f9aalIppgY https://t.co/n0PjKE5IaW
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 女性の平和と安全（WPS）アジェンダとは？womenforwomenUKと@WomenforWomenのGlobal Policy and Advocacy Managerである@_Nisha_Singhが説明します。https://t.co/f9aalIppgY https://t.co/n0PjKE5IaW
什么是妇女和平与安全（WPS）议程？@_Nisha_Singh，@womenforwomenUK和@WomenforWomen的全球政策和宣传经理，解释道。https://t.co/f9aalIppgY https://t.co/n0PjKE5IaW
什麼是婦女和平與安全（WPS）議程？@_Nisha_Singh，@womenforwomenUK和@WomenforWomen的全球政策和宣傳經理，解釋道。https://t.co/f9aalIppgY https://t.co/n0PjKE5IaW
